LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_ChargeStanchion.label: charge sniper shot
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_HeavyChargeRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_ChargeStanchion.label: stanchion sniper rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_ChargeStanchion.description: An experimental charged-shot sniper shooting mechanoid-ilke lancer shots. Combining pulse-charge technology with older gas-operated weapon design, this weapon is truly unique and yet, extremely powerful.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_HeavyChargeRifle.label: heavy charge rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_HeavyChargeRifle.description: A heavy charged-shot assault rifle shooting in short two bullet bursts. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.
